description:
Update Your Software Instantly to Keep All Software at Best

IObit Software Updater is a user-friendly tool designed to keep your software up-to-date and secure. It scans for outdated programs and updates them with one click, reducing vulnerabilities and improving performance. With a large software database, it also helps you find and install essential applications.
v8.0 2025-07-16
- Larger Database - Support updating more than 1,000 popular programs, including security, browsers, AI tools, multimedia, utilities, and more
- More Accurate Update - More accurate identification and faster update speed make your software always up to date
- Smoother Auto Update - Update software instantly without disturbing you for a smoother updating experience
- One-Click Software Installation - One click to install software on a new/reinstalled computer to save your time and efforts
- Redesigned Modern UI - More intuitive and beautiful
- Supports 36 localized languages
